textBox.richText: A word about grading of the assignments. Here is what Hiroshi did: For assignment 1, everybody received the maximal grade (10pt). Here the only thing that we wanted to see was some code that compiled and did something, anything. For PA3, Hiroshi looked at the test cases and your program. He took into account the quality of the code and the number of successfully passed test cases. The grade of assignment 2 is the same as that of assignment 3.
